meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intensive.
meanings.sent1: Her dance performance showed great intensivenesses.
meanings.sent2: The intensivenesses of the colors in the painting were striking.
meanings.sent3: The intensivenesses of the chef's seasoning made the dish unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The intensivenesses of the storm's winds shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The intensivenesses of the workout left her feeling accomplished.

meanings.definition: The degree of intensity or strength.
meanings.sent1: The intensivenesses of the storm surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: His speech lacked the necessary intensivenesses to captivate the audience.
meanings.sent3: The intensivenesses of the toddler's tantrum were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The intensivenesses of the competition made her heart race.
meanings.sent5: The intensivenesses of the argument could be felt in the room.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is intense or concentrated.
meanings.sent1: The intensivenesses of the sunlight made her squint.
meanings.sent2: The intensivenesses of the perfume filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The intensivenesses of the student's focus impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The intensivenesses of the flavors in the dish were delightful.
meanings.sent5: The intensivenesses of the music moved the audience to tears.
